text.section: Under supervision, rule or regulation, and control of the Department, a person may catch carp with bow and arrow and by gig.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a dip net or seine not more than 6 feet in length nor more than 4 feet in depth may be used to catch bait fish.
A dip net or seine may not be used within 50 yards of the mouth of any river or tributary or the base of any dam.

text.section: Fish may not be snagged by means of hooks.
